thread.title: Clean, Quiet, and Hyattastic
thread.title_full: Clean, Quiet, and Hyattastic - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: AlwaysReadyToRoam
title: Clean, Quiet, and Hyattastic
text: While just a bit further away from SFO than some other options, and on our night significantly cheaper than the Marriott, this was a great choice. Reasonably priced bar/small restaurant. A great spot for the night before an early flight.
